message:
It took a week, but now I have added links to each of the tools mentioned in my developer toolset blog post. Check them out :)

http://gurustop.net/blog/2014/04/01/tools-i-use-when-developing-on-net/
name: Tools I Use When Developing On .NET
caption: gurustop.net
description: There was a question in a tech facebook group I co-manage about what tools you'd use if starting a new project today. I don't know for sure. It depends -of course- is the expected answer. For examp...
